summary: A lightweight container that defines the common hyper‑parameter fields shared by learning‑rate schedulers, such as warm‑up, annealing and hold phases. It is deliberately not a NeMo Config object and therefore carries no name attribute.
business_intent: Provide a unified, reusable set of scheduler settings so that training pipelines can configure warm‑up, decay and hold behavior without coupling to the NeMo configuration system.
